pkgmetadata.longdescription: Web Application for the SSD Module of the MOSAIC Platform // Web application using 'shiny' for the SSD (Species Sensitivity Distribution) module of the MOSAIC (MOdeling and StAtistical tools for ecotoxICology) platform. It estimates the Hazardous Concentration for x% of the species (HCx) from toxicity values that can be censored and provides various plotting options for a better understanding of the results. See our companion paper Kon Kam King et al. (2014) doi:10.48550/arXiv.1311.5772.
